description: Release Managers: Michael Park, Neil Conway

issues.title: Add support for SemVer build and prerelease labels to stout.
Add `dist` target to CMake solution
Report volume usage through ResourceStatistics.
Copy provisioner cannot replace directory with symlink
Registry puller cannot fetch blobs correctly from http Redirect 3xx urls.
Update leveldb patch file to suport s390x
Failed to compile mesos on arm64 due to leveldb lack of support for arm64
Semantics of `environment` differ across Windows and POSIX
Port CFS quota support to Docker Containerizer using command executor.
Add 'syntax=proto2' to all .proto files in Mesos
Large docker images causes container launch failures: Too many levels of symbolic links.
The default stout stringify always copies its argument
Reject optimized builds with libcxx before 3.9
Check that `PreferredToolArchitecture` is set to `x64` on Windows before building
Reserve operation should validate reserved resource role against resource allocationInfo role
Create a test filter for stout tests that use `symlink` on Windows, as they will fail if not run as admin
XFS disk isolator should check whether quotas are enabled
Adding support for s390x architecture
Enable glog stack traces when we call things like `ABORT` on Windows
network/cni isolator generates incomplete resolv.conf
Transition Windows away from `os::killtree`.
Reconsider process creation primitives on Windows
FutureTest.After3 is flaky
Docker containerizer: mangled environment when env value contains LF byte.
A compromised mesos-master node can execute code as root on agents.
PerfTest.Version fails on recent Arch Linux
Update framework authorization to support multiple roles
FaultToleranceTest.FrameworkReregister is flaky
Add test for framework upgrading to MULTI_ROLE with tasks running
CgroupsAnyHierarchyWithPerfEventTest.ROOT_CGROUPS_PERF_PerfTest is broken on Fedora 25.
Framework credentials can be used to register as an agent.
mesos-fetcher fails with openssl-related output.
Outstanding offers to a dropped framework role should be rescinded
OSX broken due to wrong configuration of LevelDB after update.
Add `role` to task/executor to indicate allocation role of their resources
Agents should be able to upgrade to be MULTI_ROLE capable
CMake does not incrementally recompile
Couple of MULTI_ROLE related tests are flaky
Requesting tiny amount of CPU crashes master.
Persistent volume ownership is set to root when task is running with non-root user
HTTP health check doesn't work when mesos runs with --docker_mesos_image
Tasks launched via the default executor cannot access disk resource volumes.
Base64 encoding/decoding (via stout) behaves differently on Windows
Enabling cgroups_limit_swap can lead to "invalid argument" error.
RemoveNestedContainer returns unsupported.
New mesos-style.py linter behavior breaks commiting when virtualenv is not installed
Remove deprecated ACLs `SetQuota` and `RemoveQuota`
maintenance.html is missing during packaging
User supplied task environment variables cause warnings in sandbox stdout.
Possibly duplicate environment variables should not leak values to the sandbox.
Containerizer startup may cause sensitive data to leak into sandbox logs.
Java V1 Framwork Test failed on macOS
Unified containerizer does not support docker registry version < 2.3.
Unified containerizer provisions docker image error with COPY backend
Backwards incompatible UpdateFrameworkMessage handling
Fix post-reviews.py to find `rbt.cmd` on Windows
Mesos failed to build on Windows due to error C2440: 'return': cannot convert from 'Error' to 'bool'
CopyFetcherPluginTest.FetchExistingFile
Upgrading Mesos to 1.2.0 results in some information missing from the `/flags` endpoint.
Framework role tracking in allocator results in framework treated as active incorrectly.
Log HTTP accesses to the /files endpoint
Agent crashes if the task name is too long
Network isolator crashes agent on startup when network interface cannot be found
Failed to pull image from Nexus Registry due to signature missing.
Improver master robustness against duplicate UPIDs
Compile error with recent glibc
Improve agent re-registration robustness.
Build failure with glibc 2.12.
Mesos 1.2.0 crashes with pre-1.0 Mesos agents.
The mesos master crashes due to an incorrect invariant check in the decoder.
Registry puller cannot fetch manifests from Amazon ECR: 405 Unsupported.
Per-role Suppress call implementation is broken.
Registry puller cannot fetch manifests from Google GCR: 403 Forbidden.
glyphicons-halflings-regular.woff2 is missing in WebUI
Compilation error on recent glibc in cgroups device subsystem
Recent Docker versions cannot be parsed by stout.
CMake build does not make sure proto outputs are generated before attempting to compile users
Provisioner recover should not always assume 'rootfses' dir exists.
Pre-1.2.x master does not work with 1.2.x agent.
VersionTest.ParseInvalid aborts on Windows.
Major performance regression in DRF sorter.
Don't validate re-registrations that are going to be dropped.
Consistently use EXIT() during agent startup.
Add support for frameworks to receive resources for multiple roles.
Executor authentication
Allow frameworks to modify the role(s) they are subscribed to.
Upgrade bundled leveldb to 1.19
Add IPv6 support to net::IP and net::IPNetwork
mesos.interface: Allow using protobuf 3.x
Complete the list of API Calls on the Operator HTTP API Doc
Task group executor should support command health checks.
Add authentication support to the default executor
Agent cgroup assignment should precede agent initialization.
Add support for agent capabilities
Introduce a general non-interpreting task check.
Disallow (re-)registration attempts by old agents.
Consistent symlink behavior for os::stat accessors.
port_mapping isolator: do not depend on /sys/class/net/<ifname>/speed
ExamplesTest.PersistentVolumeFramework failed on ASF CI
Add an Agent API call to cleanup nested container artifacts
Introduce precompiled headers (on Windows)
Default executor does not support general checks.
Replace Boost Type Traits leftovers with STL
Health checker does not support pause / resume.
General checker does not support TCP checks.
General checker does not support pause / resume.
General checker does not support command checks via agent.
Deprecate Visual Studio 14 2015
Reduce copying of the Registry to improve Registrar performance.
ZK master contender and detector don't respect zk_session_timeout option
Incorporate CMake into standard documentation
Test case: Escape containerizer command line on Windows
unit-test for port-mapper CNI plugin
Add infrastructure for unit tests in the new python-based CLI.
Implement GET_AGENT call in v1 agent API.
Display role weight / role quota information in the webui.
Validate that tasks / executors / reservations / volumes do not mix Resource.allocation_info.roles.
Validate that schedulers cannot perform operations on offers with different allocation roles.
Update the webui to reflect that frameworks have multiple roles.
Enable SSL in Mesos builds
Update release notes for multi-role changes
Allow to specific the device whitelist entries in cgroup devices subsystem
Refactor Docker::run to only take docker cli parameters
Add `role` section to response of /state endpoint
Add authorization tests for debug API handlers
Do not send offers to MULTI_ROLE schedulers if agent does not have MULTI_ROLE capability.
Ensure offer operations can be applied for MULTI_ROLE and non-MULTI_ROLE frameworks.
Remove validation against "/" characters in roles to support hierarchical roles.
Update the webui to reflect hierarchical roles.
Add a 'Secret' protobuf message
Add the SecretGenerator module interface
Add authentication support to agent's '/v1/executor' endpoint
Add agent support for generating and passing executor secrets
Implement a JWT SecretGenerator
Implement a JWT authenticator
Introduce a 'Principal' type
Enable multiple HTTP authenticator modules
Add a 'secret' field to the 'Environment' message
Add an '--executor_secret_key' flag to the agent
Update the authorizer interface for executor authentication
Add implicit executor authorization to local authorizer
Update the allocator to handle hierarchical roles.
Update authorization / authorization-filtering to handle hierarchical roles.
Prevent setting quota on nested roles not contained by parent role quota.
Update quota cluster capacity heuristic for hierarchical roles.
Prevent quota removal that violates parent role-child role quota containment.
Update agent for hierarchical roles.
Remove adjustment code within Resources::apply.
Re-persist tasks/executors with allocation info during agent recovery.
Add a test for a MULTI_ROLE master re-registering an old agent.
Migrate setting in config.py to a TOML file
Create a table abstraction for the Mesos CLI
Remove deprecated ACL `ShutdownFramework`
Add resource provider API protobuf.
Add authorization to agent executor API
Add authentication to the checker and health checker libraries
Add deprecation warning for Visual Studio 14 2015
Benchmark performance of hierarchical roles
Bump the default timeout value for docker volume driver unmount operation.
Add executor authentication documentation
Update documentation to reflect the addition of multi-role framework support.
